item.title: Ionic 2 Framework - Integrating FCM Notifications
item.description: What? I don’t know man, you clicked this link, you tell me… Ionic? If you are unfamiliar with the Ionic framework, I’d start by checking out some of the docs and features before going through this. Essentially we will be using this framework to display content on a mobile platform (Android, iOS, WP), and be sending native notifications to the device via Firebase (A Google service for messaging, authentication, and a bunch of others).
